Name: De Japanner
Review Text: The Japanese restaurant has an original concept.  It is a kind of ‚ÄúJapanese Tapas bar‚Äù.  It is based on the Japanese izakaya: small bars where workers can relax after a long day at work with beer, sake and finger food.  The Japanese are the ‚Ä¶

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: The food is really delicious and looks nice. The Restaurant has a big selektion of different small dishes, so that you can order a bit of everything. It is a really good place to go to as a group, because you can share all the dishes. ‚Ä¶

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: It was zo GEZELLIG! I had dinner with my friend on an 'ordinary' Monday evening in their location in the Albert Cuypstraat. However, it felt far from ordinary as the place was packed and had a lovely and lively buzz, which turned the ‚Ä¶

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Weird looking plates were delivered with absolutely tasty Japanese dish. I love that this place has an European atmosphere yet the dishes they have are authentic Japanese. I will deffo come back!

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Best Japanese food ever! incredible and surprisingly good! service perfect and really friendly and welcoming‚Ä¶ and wonderful and delicious food!!!!!

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Japanese small bar/restaurant. Choice of dishes is not very broad and neither are the dishes. This can be found back in their pricing which us quite ok. Cocktails however are terrible, very bitter. Service was not very good... all together would recommend it for a quick bite but not for a nice dinner or something like that.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: This place is a must if you're in the mood for authentic Japanese small plates. We had the most fantastic sushi, top quality chicken katsu with a home-made tonkatsu sauce, fluffy pork bao and tender beef tataki. ‚Ä¶

Name: De Japanner
Review Text:
Great cocktails and small bites.
I recommend the spinach salad and both sashimi‚Äôs. Oysters were also fresh and tasty!

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Proud to say that this is my favourite place in town! Casual (but dressing up is fun too!), great food, super service and location is perfect. Oh and their cocktails are great too, try their special bloody mary. Enjoy!

Name: De Japanner
Review Text:
Amazing food! Must try the shows fries!!!

+ fresh ‚Ä¶

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: DELICIOUS!!! This place really worth several visits. The dishes were very tastefull and original Japanese. The prices are extremely fair. The selection is not like touristic menu so I suggest you taste as much as you can. The place is casual and stays open til l300am

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Great food, slow service. Lots of choices for drinks, but the actual menu is quite lacking. A little bit overpriced, but the cocktails are amazing. Orders take forever to come, and they don't clean up the tables.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: üî•

Review Text: Great food, good atmosphere and really friendly staff. The soft shell crab is delicious.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: I would definitely come to this place again. A Japanese drink place with decent Japanese snacks. We had gyozas, spinach with sesame sauce and squid fries, beautiful they were. Friendly staff but 4.5 stars given where it is and slightly pricey

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Highly recommend! Amazing, delicious food worth a visit! The staff are very friendly and knowledgable.

Name: De Japanner

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Food was good and served quickly. Friendly staff and very helpful. Would also try the sake fromm there.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Top quality of the food. But you need to order realy a lot to get full üòâ

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: We had some expectations due to other reviews, but the food was rather greasy and not that fresh. Also the music felt quite random. The whole ambience made it feel a bit more like a fast food place then an actual authentic Japanese restaurant. Not the kind of Japanese restaurant I‚Äôve experienced at other places.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Amazing food. Great prices. Excellent service. We will definitely come back.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: nice staff, delicious food and atmosphere full of good energy :---)

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Last week we did enjoy dinner here a lot! We did not make a reservation but after half an hour seats behind the bar were available. The service is really fast, polite and they know what they are talking about. The food is amazing, the ‚Ä¶

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Love it. Recommend it. Will come back, just for this. It is not traditional Japanese food, but it is even better. Served in tapas style, so it is ideal for a date. Always crowded, so book in advance. You won't be disappointed. I never was.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Best Asian fusion place I've been in a while in this city, non pretentious and these guys actually know what they are doing. We were surprised with the chefs menu, and this was far from disappointing. Approx. 10 small dishes for 2 persons, ‚Ä¶

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Love this place, friendly staff and good food. Some portions are bigger than the other, some are somewhat pricey for what you get. My tips are the miso eggplant and the oyster mushrooms. Enough options for vegetarians.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Great food, great beers and great ambience. One of the popular eating restaurants in Amsterdam. Only thing is the portions are a bit small, that‚Äôs the only reason I didn‚Äôt give it a 5, you‚Äôll end up ordering everything off the many, twice if in a group.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Cozy, good service, good food, great music. Cocktail something poison was very nice! We had a total of 7 dishes, with 2 people and that was plenty! Oh, and the price is quite not-Amsterdam!

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Good service for Dutch place, international and local guests. Food is quite good especially spinach salad. A tip: if u order all the things on the menu in 3 u still spend less than the chef ' s menu that includes everything üòâ make ur counts, enjoy, thank me later ;)

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: This place is just a winner. Great Japanese beer selection and sake selection. Staff is super busy but super friendly. Portions are small and for sharing. Been here twice this week. It‚Äôs just cafe style but then A+ food. Great job and keep up the good work!

Name: De Japanner
Review Text:
Every. Single. Dish. Is. Amazing.

The food is on point, the service staff are friendly and try hard to accommodate ‚Ä¶

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Late night delicious Japanese food in Amsterdam. From the Saba mackerel to the Fried eggplant, every dish was special, well prepared and tasty. Good selection of beers. Cozy and laid back ambiance.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Super friendly staff and good service. Great atmosphere. The place is a bit small, we only found a seat at the bar, but it was ok. Good relation price/quality.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Amazing food, cool casual vibe. Ate here 3 times during our 1 week visit to Amsterdam. Wagyu gyoza, squid fries, katsu chicken and sushi rolls are amazing. ‚Ä¶

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Great food and especially great service!

Name: De Japanner
Review Text:
Very friendly staff and they can make you a nice cocktail. The food was tasty, but not special. Good price for what you get.
Location is nice, but the interior is really not cosy. Somebody should turn the design around.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: I am not a vegetarian, but I would go back there just for the spinach salad with peanuts and sesame dressing, delicious. very nice eggplant, and great cheesecake with lime and yuzu. Will visit again soon!

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Nice selection of sake, reasonable priced, excellent service.the  Dishes where super tasty. I didn't like that the music was to loud and the tables are a bit uncomfortable.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Great calamari fries, relaxed and local atmosphere. It is like asian street food with a bar pub twist. I liked the gingerbread man cocktail a lot. Uramaki comes really tiny so not really worth it but tastes fresh and lekkkkkerrrr! I love the manga on the wall!

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: delicious food, everything was so fresh. especially liked the beef and the kimchi gyoza. atmosphere was really fun and service was so friendly. recommend the chef's menu because you get to try so many different things

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Excellent food and cocktails. The waiting list system took a bit of effort to figure out but well worth it. Quick service, very reasonable prices.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Excellent food in a izakaya-like setting. The menu is great and has options to everyone's liking. The staff is kind and very helpful. De Japanner is the best place in the Netherlands to grab an 'imo sh≈çchu' on the rocks!

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Good japanese food, taste, and quality. But portions are really small and not on the cheap side... otherwise, it's good

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Cozy place for sushi, not so big. Lots of young people and nice atmosphere. Price is higher then avarage but worth a try. Nice cocktail bar too

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Japanese tapas in the pijp and the stuff is really nice.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: The food was amazing!

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: I do not think it should smell a mile away from a Japanese (read fresh fish) restaurant... Regardless of that I had some sushi there. Nope, the small was a good indicator not to go there

Name: De Japanner
Review Text:
The food is awesome, really lot of thought put in the recipes and it is delicious neo Japanese food.
The atmosphere is really weird though, with loud rap music, dimmed lights and loud people...

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Amazing restaurant. Had one of everything on the menu.. Squid fries, gyoza, chicken katzu, lime cheescake. All incredible! The staff were super friendly too and very attentive.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Great place with really tasty drinks and even tastier food. It's a bit pricey for what you receive although I do keep on returning which I think says enough ;)

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Excellent chicken katsu and great service.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Nice small place, with excellent food! We tried 10 different dishes, each of them were great/tasteful!!

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Always a pleasure. Easy and delicious japanese food üëå

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Food is ok but not great. Unfortunately the service let‚Äôs this place down. A crammed restaurant which doesn‚Äôt allow the waiters to be that attentive.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Excellent food and drinks prepared with love, passion and skill! Great ambiance and the best spot for a late night bite with some good beats.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: One of the few good restaurants in Amsterdam city to offer food until 12.15am every night. Very friendly staff and delicious food.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: One of the best Japanese restaurant in Amsterdam, I absolutely loved the food, great selection of wine and romantic atmosphere (when you come in later at night) It is perfect for delicious meal in good company.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Good was between ok and very good, the service is very slow and the prices are quite high

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Mm..there definitely are way better Japanese restaurants and/or bars in town.The food is just mediocre and the portion is just unbelievably small. Very friendly staff tho.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Both the cocktails and dishes are phenomenal - great for a casual night out. It can get busy and loud

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Awesome place to have diner with a group of friends. Outstanding food and great atmosphere! Also loved the service.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: I liked the food, especially salmon tataki. Just needed some patience to wait for a place and get used to the noise/crowd. It was all worth it!

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: The best Japanese we've been to in Amsterdam. Friendly staff, great cocktails, tight menu and most importantly, delicious food!

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Super good, good food and craft beer from Japan. It's a fusion japanese, so no traditional dishes but a mix of culture

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Love the food there and the fact that the kitchen is opened until late :-) service is also very good and they always manage to find you a seat with a smile!

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: One of my favorites in Amsterdam! Chef's menu is always delicious and original, and the staff are so welcoming.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Perfect combination of great Japanese food and a funky atmosphere with young waiters, great music and a stylish Amsterdam crowd!

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: Best thing is that you'll get sushi til late in the night. Very good quality of the food for a very fair price.

Name: De Japanner
Review Text: The food is great. The only thing that keeps me from returning to this place is the idiotically loud music that prevents you from having a normal conversation.

Review Text: Great food, just opening time was off in google maps! Opens at 6pm!

Name: De Japanner
